document_data.name: Pipeweed Dreams
document_data.mainbody: '''''Pipeweed Dreams''''' was a lively ditty and a popular [[halfling]] drinking song, written and popularized sometime before [[1368 DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1368 DR]], ''Pipeweed Dreams'' was performed by the god [[Milil]], the Lord of All Songs. He imposed the beautiful song on an audience of [[Sensates]] from [[Sigil]] who were performing a ''[[Scrying (spell)|scrying]]'' ritual to experience the forbidden experience of spying on [[Toril]]lian deities. The song's infectious melody caused many in the audience hum and sing along.
